InstructionData.Title: Mars Intake Control
InstructionData.Description: Control the intake of atmo for Mars to have a stockpile of cool gas to regulate base tempâ€‹
InstructionData.Author: Renrek
InstructionData.Instructions:
define MINPRESSURE 5000 define MAXPRESSURE 10000 define VENTS -1129453144 define TOKELVIN 273.15 define GOOD 2 #two criteria need to be met
alias tank d0 alias outsideSensor d1
alias tankPressure r0 alias ventStatus r1 alias outsideTemp r2 alias pressureStatus r3 alias tempStatus r4 alias operationalCheck r5
main:
l outsideTemp outsideSensor Temperature sle tempStatus outsideTemp 233.15 #-40c l tankPressure tank Pressure slt pressureStatus tankPressure MAXPRESSURE add operationalCheck pressureStatus tempStatus seq ventStatus operationalCheck GOOD sb VENTS On ventStatus
j main
